Description: Which two signs and two numbers should be interchanged in the following equation to make it correct: 18 × 12 - 51 ÷ 34 + 17 = 185
Solution:
Given equation

18 × 12 - 51 ÷ 34 + 17 = 185

BODMAS rule:-

1) 17 and 51, × and -

18 × 12 - 51 ÷ 34 + 17 = 185

Interchanging the signs and numbers and using BODMAS rule:-

18 - 12 × 17 ÷ 34 + 51 

= 18 - 12 × 0.5 + 51

= 18 - 6 + 51

= 69 - 6

= 63 ≠ 185

2) 51 and 17, × and ÷ 

18 × 12 - 51 ÷ 34 + 17 = 185

Interchanging the signs and numbers and using BODMAS rule:-

18 ÷ 12 - 17 × 34 + 51

= 1.5 - 17 × 34 + 51

= 1.5 - 578 + 51

= 52.5 - 578

= - 525.5 ≠ 185

3) 34 and 51, × and + 

18 × 12 - 51 ÷ 34 + 17 = 185

Interchanging the signs and numbers and using BODMAS rule:-

18 + 12 - 34 ÷ 51 × 17

= 18 + 12 - 0.67 × 17

= 18 + 12 - 11.33

= 30 - 11.33

= 18.67 ≠ 185

4) 34 and 51, + and ÷ 

18 × 12 - 51 ÷ 34 + 17 = 185

Interchanging the signs and numbers and using BODMAS rule:-

18 × 12 - 34 + 51 ÷ 17 

= 18 × 12 - 34 + 3

= 216 - 34 + 3

= 219 - 34

= 185 = 185

Hence, the correct answer is "34 and 51, + and ÷".

  • The subject of the given sentence is 'He'.

  • The subject will be put in place of the object and the object will be put in place of the subject.
  • 'opened' will be changed into 'was opened'. 
  • Lastly, the conjunction 'by' will be added. 
  • Therefore, as per the points mentioned above, we find that the correct answer is Option 3. 
    ���

Correct Sentence: The window was opened by him.

Additional Information

  • The transformation of imperative sentences: 
  • If someone gives a command, do request, express a desire or wish, in sentences then such sentences are called an imperative sentence.
  • If the notion of a sentence is 'Command' then structure: 
    • V1 + Object. (Active Voice)
    • Let + subject + be + V3. (Passive Voice)
